name: Sparklecarbon
description:
A small prototype of a procedural city-cruiser. Inspired by aimlessly driving around in many games over the years.

Mechanics:

  • Just drive! If you crave a goal, there are pink waypoints which will refresh when you visit them. Throw on some synthwave/whatever if it suits your fancy.
  • Controls:
    • B: respawn at nearest road (if you get stuck or fall out of the map)
    • Enter: spawn new map.
    • WASD: drive
    • Space: brake
    • C: change to third person cam
    • M: view overhead map (player is small teal arrow, destination is red circle)
